mapper.select: select idx, userid, passwd, username, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2, post, addr1, addr2, to_char(joindate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as joindate from kakao_member where userid=#{userid} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kakao_member(idx, userid, passwd, username, phone1, phone2, phone3, email1, email2, post, addr1, addr2, joindate) VALUES (kakao_mem_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, sysdate)
